snippet: Within five days, two oarfish were found in California last month, giving marine biologists a rare opportunity to study a lengthy and elusive big fish.
abstract: Two oarfish found in California give marine biologists rare opportunity to study one of world's most elusive and awe-inspiring big fish; oarfish, which are long and eel-like in appearance, can grow to stupendous lengths and have inspired tales of sea monsters since ancient times; remains were dissected and divvied up among a handful of research institutions.
lead_paragraph: Within five days, two oarfish were found in California last month, giving marine biologists a rare opportunity to study a lengthy and elusive big fish.

headline.main: Oarfish Offer Chance to Study an Elusive Animal Long Thought a Monster
headline.print_headline: Oarfish Offer Chance to Study an Elusive Animal Long Thought a Monster
